author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATEGORY 5 MELISSA NOW MOVING NORTHWESTWARD WHILE WARNINGS ARE ISSUED FOR THE BAHAMAS AND THE TURKS AND CAICOS... ...CATASTROPHIC AND LIFE-THREATENING WINDS, FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE EXPECTED ON JAMAICA TONIGHT AND EARLY TUESDAY...
summary: ...CATEGORY 5 MELISSA NOW MOVING NORTHWESTWARD WHILE WARNINGS ARE ISSUED FOR THE BAHAMAS AND THE TURKS AND CAICOS... ...CATASTROPHIC AND LIFE-THREATENING WINDS, FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE EXPECTED ON JAMAICA TONIGHT AND EARLY TUESDAY... As of 5:00 PM EDT Mon Oct 27 the center of Melissa was located near 16.7, -78.4 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 906 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 175 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...CATEGORY 5 MELISSA NOW MOVING NORTHWESTWARD WHILE WARNINGS ARE ISSUED FOR THE BAHAMAS AND THE TURKS AND CAICOS... ...CATASTROPHIC AND LIFE-THREATENING WINDS, FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE EXPECTED ON JAMAICA TONIGHT AND EARLY TUESDAY... As of 5:00 PM EDT Mon Oct 27 the center of Melissa was located near 16.7, -78.4 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 906 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 175 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
